modName: Subtle Realistic ENB with FXAA and Lighting
summary: realistic settings for FXAA, ENB and realistic lighting
descriptionHtml:
Subtle Realistic settings for FXAA, ENB and Realistic Lighting
==============================================================
My settings for ENB/fxaa/RL- just though id post what i felt was nice, I tryed 10-15 enb settings out and couldn\'t find what i was looking for so did these- maybe this will help someone.

ENB- mostly realistic and colorful nothing crazy imo 
FXAA- adds even more color and some sharpening yadaa yadaa
Realistic lighting- **MILDY** darker nights and indoors; will probably piss off people who think pitch black is realistic and still manage to be too dark for others, but i like it! also caves semi close to vanilla so you can see where your going.




++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
Install notes

-Inside  zip pick between files for ENB only ,ENB+ FXAA , and ENB+FXAA+Realistic lighting
(they are designed to work together but each part  works well on its own)


-shift+f12 turns enb on/off; pause/break turns fxaa on/off; uncheck realisticlighting patcher esp to turn  RL on/off

Recommended mods: WATER mod , sun and cloud textures , some mod to reduce or remove fog. blah blah blah 
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
